full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DUR KHROD BDAG PO'I BSKANG GSO GSER SKYEMS MNGA' GSOL BKRA SHIS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES DPAL DUR KHROD KYI BDAG PO'I BSKANG GSO DNGOS GRUB 'BAR BA'I CES BYA BA 'DI NI SNGON DU GSER GLING GI BLA MA BKA' BCU BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYI BSKUL BAR MA ZAD, RJES SU YANG BRAG KHUGS NYER BA BLO BZAN RDO RJES 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA DANG, YANG MNGA' GSOL BKRA SHIS GSER SKYEMS 'DI DAG LA DVAGS RGYAL SRAS NO NO BKA' CHEN BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, ^'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GSOL DPON BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG GO , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES,
